articles.title: Why researchers are questioning Lancet study that linked HCQ to higher Covid death risk - ThePrint
articles.description: More than a hundred scientists have raised questions about the dataset used in the study published by The Lancet, which led to WHO halting all trials of HCQ.
articles.content: New Delhi: Several questions are being raised about the study published in prominent medical journal The Lancet, which concluded that anti-malarial drug hydroxychloroquine (HCQ) increases risk of dea… [+8202 chars]
